channel.title: Help with client please
channel.description: i just jar'd and signed my client compiled with jdk7 and my friend can't open it, is it because he needs the same version of java i created/compiled the client.jar with? if so.. is there any other way that i can make the client.jar so that all users can open it without having to download the same version of java that i compiled/created the client with?

item.title: Help with client please
item.dc:creator: @nath1168 nath1168
item.description:
@nath1168 wrote:

i just jar’d and signed my client compiled with jdk7 and my friend can’t open it, is it because he needs the same version of java i created/compiled the client.jar with? if so… is there any other way that i can make the client.jar so that all users can open it without having to download the same version of java that i compiled/created the client with?
